course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner Clinical Practicum III
course_description: This course promotes integration of the student into the NP role providing care for acutely/ chronically ill children/families. Emphasis on interprofessional leadership, advocacy, and creation of care delivery material.
prerequisites: NRSG 569D prerequisite and NRSG 628D co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll in NRSG 628D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 5278, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
